review: Everything you need and would expect from a streaming device. Feels snappier than the Roku and Roku 2: I haven't tried the roku stick so I can't compare the 2. I do like the interface, fairly simple straightforward and for prime members lots of content readily available.I was happy to see that the remote operates over 2.4ghz instead of IR like some roku devices. I have this set up in the bedroom and seing as its behind the TV, line of sight would be very inconvenient.All in all I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a streaming device. The remote and unit are solid and streamlined in Matte black and look good in any room
